text: Illinois' 13th legislative district is one of 59 districts of the Illinois General Assembly. It corresponds to the 13th Senate district and the 25th and 26th districts of the Illinois House of Representatives. It spans an economically diverse area and includes the Chicago communities of East Side, Hyde Park, South Shore, and Streeterville. ==Senators== * Richard H. Newhouse Jr. * Alice Palmer * Barack Obama * Kwame Raoul Category:Illinois legislative districts
title: Illinois 13th Legislative District
